programme.title: Aventurera
programme.desc: A group of conspirators plots an assassination against Venezuela's presidente Romulo Betancourt

programme.title: Crimen En Tijuana
programme.desc: When a complot to kill a politician in Tijuana by order of a drug lord is discovered, the suspect run away to the mountains.

programme.title: 72 Horas Para Morir
programme.desc: A triggerman nicknamed El Texano, raised by his father to be a hitman since he was abandoned by his mother, hears from a fortune teller that he has just 72 hours to live.

programme.title: El Camino Correcto
programme.desc: Arturo, a kid from the town of El Verde Bonao in rural Dominican Republic, takes advantage of the opportunities presented to him by going to town hoping to help his mother who has just been diagnosed with leukemia. Everything changes when he least expected.

programme.title: Yo Soy Otro
programme.desc: Jose discovers that not only has a classified mysterious disease where his body is covered by voracious bacterias, but also there are several 'replicas' of him with the same disease and looking for each other to kill the duplicates.

programme.title: Delivery Boy
programme.desc: An inept delivery boy takes a package with sensitive information and is confused with El Tiburón, a dangerous spy. Now, Agent Azul must try to stop this delivery thru a city in the middle of a pandemic, while El Tiburón tries to recover the package and unleash a terrorist attack in Florida with the codes it contains and this Delivery Boy just tries to do its unassuming job.

programme.title: Medeas
programme.desc: A daring and lyrical exploration of alienation and desperation through the intimate observation of a family's inner lives and their relationship to each other and their environment.

programme.title: Madres Michoacanas
programme.desc: When criminals take Michoacan, the women of the town fear for their children, who could be drafted by the new mafia.

programme.title: Reto Sangriento
programme.desc: A ghost hunting TV show begins to run into trouble as TV ratings start to drop. The owner of the television station forces the team to look for fresh content with realism at the cost of anything.

programme.title: Beast: A Monster Among Men
programme.desc: Five friends head out on a getaway to a secluded cabin just outside of the Six Rivers National Forest. An argument forces the group apart and things begin to deteriorate quickly. As the night progresses, tensions build, and things are clearly not what they seem.The question each man must now ask themselves is how well do they know each other and how well do they really know themselves.

programme.title: El Mundo Es Tuyo
programme.desc: When a powerful drug lord forbids kidnappings on his territories, there is only a man enforcing this rule: Comandante Anthrax.

programme.title: The Yunque Forest: Area 51
programme.desc: During a visit to El Yunque Forest, two cousins are kidnapped and bullied by federal agents after trying to summit the reserve's highest point. Unbeknown to them, there is an "Area 51" facility in there and they just stumbled into it.

programme.title: Territorio Marcado
programme.desc: Felipe and his brother Alfonso have made a powerful enemy: Romulo, the most ruthless mafia boss in the region. One of them messed with his business and the other got in love with his daughter.

programme.title: En Mis Propias Manos
programme.desc: The wife of a police officer is molested, beaten and mentally and physically abused. Other police officers suspect that something is happening, but the woman is afraid to speak up and accuse her abuser.
